title: Bruschetta
ingredients: 1/2 c sun-dried tomatoes, packed in oil
instructions: Preheat oven on broiler setting. In a large bowl, combine roma tomatoes, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, vinegar, basil, salt, and pepper. Allow to sit for 10 minutes. Cut baguette into 3/4 inch slices. On a baking sheet, arrange baguette slices in a single layer. Broil for 1-2 minutes until slightly brown. Divide tomato mixture evenly over baguette slices. Top with mozzarella cheese. Broil for 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.
